item.title: ETH, XRP, and CYBER currently rank in the top three in Upbit's Korean Won market trading volume leaderboard
item.description: On August 18th, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, the trading volume on Upbit has rebounded to $2.521 billion, showing a 24-hour increase of 76.0%. Among them, the ETH/KRW trading pair accounted for 15.95% of the trading volume and ranked first in the Korean won market. The remaining top five are: XRP, CYBER, STRIKE, BTC.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX net inflow was 1,079.08 BTC
item.description: On August 18th, according to Coinglass data, during the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of BTC on CEX was 1,079.08 BTC. The top three CEX exchanges in terms of inflow volume are as follows:· Kraken had a net inflow of 1,404.79 BTC;· bitFlyer had a net inflow of 167.87 BTC;· Bithumb had a net inflow of 38.81 BTC.Moreover, Coinbase Pro witnessed a net outflow of 204.48 BTC and ranked first in the outflow list.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $4300
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum fell below $4300, experiencing a 24-hour decline of 3.19%.

item.title: X Layer Network TVL Skyrockets, Surpassing $88 Million in a Short Period to Hit an All-Time High
item.description: August 18th. According to l2beat data, at 17:00 yesterday, the TVL of X Layer Network exceeded $88 million and reached a new all-time high. Currently, it has dropped to $84 million and has witnessed a 100% increase in the past week.

item.title: If Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative long liquidation on major CEXs will reach $520 million.
item.description: On August 18th, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX will reach 520 million.Conversely, if Ethereum surges above $4450, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX will reach 801 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not display the precise number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree reaching a certain price level will have an impact. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Metaplanet increased its holdings by 775 BTC, bringing the total holdings to 18,888 BTC.
item.description: On August 18th, Metaplanet announced in a post that it had repurchased 775 bitcoins, increasing its total holdings to 18,888 BTC.At the time of the announcement, Metaplanet's stock price rose by 0.58% on this day, reaching a market value of 6203.39 billion yen. It has seen a 15.60% decrease in the past 5 days.

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Momentum Paused, with a CEX Net Inflow of 25,500 ETH in the Past 24 Hours
item.description: On August 18th, according to Coinglass data, during the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of Ethereum on CEX was 25,500 ETH. The top three CEX inflows are as follows:· Bybit, with an inflow of 29,100 ETH;· Kraken, with an inflow of 23,400 ETH;· Bithumb, with an inflow of 2,309.14 ETH.In addition, Binance had an outflow of 31,600 ETH, ranking first in outflows.

item.title: An address recently averaged $23.46 to accumulate 932,000 LINK tokens, worth nearly $22 million.
item.description: On August 18th, according to on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, the address 0x4EB...3d5aF withdrew $5.45 million worth of LINK from Binance half an hour ago. In the past three days, the amount of LINK accumulated by this address has increased to 932,000 tokens, which is worth $21.88 million, with an average price of $23.46.

item.title: LINK has surged over 50% in the past two weeks, possibly driven by positive factors such as the LINK Reserves Program and on-chain whale accumulation of LINK.
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, LINK has witnessed a surge of over 50% in the past two weeks and is currently trading at $25.1.In early August, Chainlink launched the "LINK Reserve Fund Program", converting on-chain oracle network revenue and off-chain enterprise service fees into LINK token reserves in a proportional manner. The reserve fund has exceeded one million dollars. In the long term, it will create a supply shock through a continuous buyback mechanism to enhance the token's value-capture ability.In addition, according to on-chain data, whales have been continuously accumulating LINK. In the past 24 hours, four addresses have accumulated 580,995 LINK, worth $13.86 million. Among them, the address "0x4EB" has accumulated a total of 721,294 LINK ($16.43 million). The number of large transactions for LINK has reached a seven-month high, indicating that large investors have increasing confidence in LINK.Previously, on August 11th, Chainlink partnered with Intercont

item.title: Lazarus Group Accused of Stealing ￡17 Million in Cryptocurrency, Leading to the Collapse of Cryptocurrency Exchange Lykke
item.description: On August 18th, the North Korean hacking group Lazarus Group has been determined to be the likely mastermind behind the funds stolen from the UK-registered cryptocurrency exchange Lykke. If verified, this would mark the largest cryptocurrency theft carried out by North Korea in the UK up to now. In recent years, this isolated nation has acquired billions of dollars in funds through cryptocurrency theft to support its military and nuclear programs.Lykke, which was founded in 2015 and has its headquarters in Switzerland but is registered in the UK, stated last year that it suffered a total loss of $22.8 million in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies, which forced it to suspend operations. In March of this year, a UK court ruled in favor of the liquidation of the company following a lawsuit brought by more than 70 affected users.The Office of Financial Sanctions Implementation (OFSI) under the UK Treasury identified North Korea as a potential perpetrator in a recent report.
